docs.abstract: Sam Negri article on arguments and inducements he offered in effort to persuade 15-yr-old boy to stop using marijuana (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: TUCSON, Ariz.--A high school boy I know recently told me he's been smoking marijuana since the sixth grade. I was astonished by this piece of news because I've known this boy for many years and always thought well of him.
docs.snippet: TUCSON, Ariz.--A high school boy I know recently told me he's been smoking marijuana since the sixth grade. I was astonished by this piece of news because I've known this boy for many years and always thought well of him.
